articles.title: Russian-held nuclear power plant in Ukraine, back on power grid, shuts down - CBC News
articles.description: Ukraine's atomic power operator said Sunday that the last reactor at Europe's largest nuclear power plant has been shut down after the plant was reconnected to the electricity grid.
articles.content: Europe's largest nuclear plant has been reconnected to Ukraine's electricity grid, allowing engineers to shut down its last operational reactor in an attempt to avoid a radiation disaster as fighting… [+1673 chars]

articles.author: Monique Vanek
articles.title: SA dagga producer sells all its output to Europe, Australia - a year in advance - News24
articles.description: Booming demand for medicinal cannabis from Europe to Australia has seen a South African producer sell all of its output for next year in advance.
articles.content: Booming demand for medicinal cannabis from Europe to Australia has seen a South African producer sell all of its output for next year in advance.

articles.title: Markets week ahead: These factors will drive market sentiments from Sept 12-16 | Mint - Mint

articles.author: Peter Taggart and Ramishah Maruf, CNN
articles.title: Aer Lingus cancels all flights from Dublin Airport due to IT breakdown - CNN International
articles.description: Aer Lingus canceled all flights scheduled to depart from its Dublin Airport hub that were bound for European countries and the United Kingdom because of a computer malfunction. The carrier said the outage affected 51 flights.
